body_html: On further inspection, this occurs once the system has run out of memory. In my particular application, it seems the process grows from using ~ 1 GB to using the entire system memory ~16 GB (no swap) over the course of 8 hours, and then crashes with the above message. I can at least continue training by using a swap space, but it seems there is another issue here causing a memory leak.

body: On further inspection, this occurs once the system has run out of memory.  In my particular application, it seems the process grows from using ~ 1 GB to using the entire system memory ~16 GB (no swap) over the course of 8 hours, and then crashes with the above message.   I can at least continue training by using a swap space, but it seems there is another issue here causing a memory leak.
